articles.title: Woman charged with second-degree murder after boyfriend's stabbing in Elliston
articles.description: A 21-year-old woman accused of fatally stabbing her boyfriend amid a domestic dispute in Montgomery County early Saturday morning has been charged with second-degree murder, according to the sheriff's office.
